name: Pog Dog Simulator
description:
Download here (you need to build it yourself)

https://github.com/endercat126/pog-dog-simulator/tree/demo

Building Instructions

  1.  Download the code here
  2. Download Godot Engine (It doesn't need to install) https://godotengine.org/download
  3. Extract the downloaded zip
  4. Open Godot and import the project.godot file in the extracted folder
  5. Click play in the editor to run the game
